item.description:
Aimee and I are taking the dogs on a hike next weekend at Great
Swamp Management Area and wanted to invite everybody.  We're
meeting there Sunday at 10:00.  It
can be about a six mile hike, a lot of which is around a lake
so there's plenty of water for the pups to play in.  There's
even a nice little coffee shop to stop in before or after the
hike.

http://www.visitrhodeisland.com/what-to-do/bird-watching-and-nature-walks/1523/great-swamp-management-area/

http://www.bikekinetix.com/t_ri/ri_state/greatswamp_mgmt.php


How to Get to DEM's Fish & Wildlife - Great Swamp Wildlife
Management Area and Target Range

277 Great Neck Road
West Kingston, RI 02891
Phone: (401) 789-7481
Fax: (401) 783-7490

Google Maps Link from DEM website
http://maps.google.com/maps?q=+south+county+trl%2E%2C+rte%2E+2,South+Kingstown,RI 


From the North:
Follow Interstate 95 South to Exit 9, Route 4 South
Follow Route 4 South to Route 1 South
Stay on Route 1 South for approximately three miles
At major intersection (Tower Hill) take right onto 138 West for
approximately five miles (pass URI on right)
Great Swamp Field Headquarters sign comes up on the left,
follow road all the way until you must take a left onto dirt
road; follow until you enter the area of the Headquarters
building the see signs for range.
From the South:
Follow Interstate 95 North to Exit 3, Route 138 East
Follow Route 138 East approximately 10 miles
Great Swamp Management Area sign on right;

Follow road all the way until you must take a left onto dirt road;

Follow until you enter the area of the Headquarters building the see signs for
range.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be there early to meet people
item.name: NEW RI Hike!! 6 Mile Hike.
